name: Pico-Factory
description:
Create a small factory in one screen that produces breakfast for money! How much can you earn in 4:00 minutes?

This game was made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 37! Theme: One Room.

Controls
  • Use ↑↓←→ to move your cursor across the screen.
  • Use (X) or button (2) to get in and out of the build menu.
  • Use (Z) or button (1) to select a building in the menu, and place that building in the room.
  • To replace a building with something else, use (Z) or button (1) twice.
Rules
  • The game ends after 4:00 minutes, you must get as much money as possible.
  • Every thing that arrives at the "$$" square is transformed into money.
  • You want to gather enough money to move to the next tier of buildings quickly.
  • Building tier: Tree, Bread, Juicer, Breakfast Machine, Eggs, Sandwich Machine.
  • If an item goes into a machine that does not accept it, it is destroyed.
Why this game exists?

This was my first full pico-8 game! It is a little rough around the edges, but it was fun making it. The game received decent grades, becoming 20th overall in the Compo category.
